name: query-api
description: Cloudflare Worker for R2 SQL query API

scripts.deploy: pnpm build:ui && if [ -f wrangler.local.jsonc ]; then wrangler deploy -c wrangler.local.jsonc; else echo 'Error: wrangler.local.jsonc not found. Run pnpm launch first.' && exit 1; fi
scripts.db:migrate: wrangler d1 migrations apply icelight-dashboards --local -c wrangler.local.jsonc
